definition[0]: official documents, reports etc that are used to prove that something is true or correct
definition[1]: the act of recording information in writing, on film etc
example[1]: a careful documentation of the costs
definition[2]: documents that are used to prove that something is true or correct, or as a record of something
example[2]: He was asked to provide documentation of his personal finances.
definition[3]: documents that explain how a piece of equipment works
example[3]: The lack of documentation has caused customers a significant amount of frustration.
